ComicInfo.Title: Bowser; The Succubus Stone; The Corpse With the Missing Mind; ...And an End; Deja Vu; Demons of Father Pain; The Origin of the Spirit; In Deep
ComicInfo.Summary:
This issue contains the following colorized re-prints from Warren Publishing magazines:
Bowser
The Succubus Stone
Vampirella: The Corpse with the Missing Mind
The Mummy...and an End
Deja Vu
The Demons of Father Pain
The Origin of the SpiritIn Deep
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-19 02:51:07. [CVDB222926] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 13:51:11. [Issue ID 271137]
